ygData.subject: Re: re: Duster Models
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It is a weight-reducing pack.  You need to find something really damn heavy to put in there, since the weight reduction is 10% or maybe 20%.  Nothing
ygData.messageBody:
>I've had one of those packs for a few weeks now. Got it for the Duster
>quest. It's a nice item, but it's NOT a weight-reducing pack. It's just a
>10-slot backpack, lore, nodrop.

It is a weight-reducing pack. You need to find something really damn heavy
to put in there, since the weight reduction is 10% or maybe 20%. Nothing
special, but 10-slot packs are just nice to have. I will stick a couple
blackboxes in there (weight 5 each) to verify it. I didn't think to give
Hastan Bootstrutter the pack when I did the jboots quest, but I am pretty
sure it would be fruitless.
